title: Invygo
html:
Overview

Established in 2018 and headquartered in Dubai, Invygo is the first car subscription start-up in the MENA region. I first joined the project in the idea phase and took the challenge to build the first viable product in just 1 month.

  • Website: https://www.invygo.com/
  • iOS: https://apps.apple.com/ae/app/invygo-car-rental-made-easy/id1445676307
  • Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.invygo.customer&hl=en&gl=US

Role

As a freelance technical architect, I worked on the project from idea to the first visible product with one in-house developer in just 1 month and we got the first customer in just 1 week after. I worked for Invygo in 2 years.

My primary responsibilities were managing the mobile application, enhance the backend architecture and contribute the technical solution to scale our system. I also support to build the backbone for data analytics and marketing automation system based on adjust, mixpanel, customer.io, and in-house data in MongoDB.

Besides that, I also contributed product ideas to improve business growth.

Outstanding numbers during my time

  • From idea to minimum viable product in just 1 month (with online payment gateway as well).
  • Raised more than $2M in funding and going to get the Series A.
  • Top 15 travel apps in UAE.
  • Has more than 50k users.
  • Expanded to Saudi Arabia and going to expand more.

Outstanding solutions and technologies

  • In-house Referral system
  • Mobile OCR with ML Kit
  • Online payment with Checkout
  • Data analytics and marketing automation system with adjust, mixpanel, customer.io, and in-house data in MongoDB
  • Event-driven architecture With RabbitMQ
  • Micro-services with gRPC protocol
  • The backend was built by hapijs and uses MongoDB for the main database
  • The cross-platform mobile app with React Native
  • Mobile A/B Testing and Feature Flag with Firebase
  • CI/CD with fastlane, Bitrise for mobile and Jenkins for backend, web front-end
  • Automation testing with Selenium, Appium
  • System monitoring with Prometheus, Grafana, Kibana
  • Mobile monitoring with Bugsnag and Firebase Crashlytics
  • And more features such as Maps, Places API, Push Notification, Deep linking, etc
custom_excerpt: Dubai car subscription start-up helps you to get a car without the headaches
